otherNames: Eternal Club, El comerciante del tiempo, I Built a Lifespan Club, I Built the Club of Longevity, I Created the Club of Immortality, Tôi Thành Lập Câu Lạc Bộ Trường Sinh, Wo Dazao Le Changsheng Julebu, Wo Dazaole Changsheng Julebu, Wǒ Dǎzàole Chángshēng Jù
synopsis: Chen Li works at Mo City, he works there every day with no hope of being seen in the future… until one night. Chen Li obtains a special ability, an ability to buy “Time” and “Lifespan” from people, sell “Time” and “Lifespan” and also let things speed up “Time leap” and slow down “exhaustion time”. So he begins to build a top-class “Lifespan club”!
